translations: adj.[解剖] 动脉的；干线的；像动脉的

sentences.sentence: When an arterial switch is impossible, an atrial switch will be attempted using either the Senning or Mustard procedure.
sentences.translation: 当无法进行动脉切换时，将使用森宁或马斯塔德程序尝试进行心房切换。

sentences.sentence: Swan-Ganz catheter and radial artery catheter were used to monitor the cardiac output, pulmonary arterial pressure, and arterial blood pressure.
sentences.translation: 漂浮导管和桡动脉导管用于监测心输出量，肺动脉压和动脉血压。

sentences.sentence: A measure of arterial blood flow to the head.
sentences.translation: 对流向大脑的动脉血的测量。
